body.para: When performing maintenance on the machine, the running status of the ladder program can be checked on the Ladder screen.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
